titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ قَالَ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ وَحْدَهُ وَحْدَهُ
titles.en: Chapter 38 – The one who says, ‘There is no god except Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, Alone, Alone, Alone

titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ قَالَ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ عَشْراً
titles.en: Chapter 39 – The one who says, ‘There is no god except Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, Alone, there being nor associate for Him<sup>azwj</sup>’, ten (times)

titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ قَالَ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَ اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
titles.en: Chapter 37 – The who says, ‘There is no God except Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, and Allah<sup>azwj</sup> is the Greatest

titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ قَالَ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ وَحْدَهُ وَحْدَهُ
titles.en: Chapter 38 – The one who says, ‘There is no god except Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, Alone, Alone, Alone

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مرسل - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (2/201)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ النُّعْمَانِ عَمَّنْ ذَكَرَهُ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: قَالَ جَبْرَئِيلُ ( عليه السلام ) لِرَسُولِ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) طُوبَى لِمَنْ قَالَ مِنْ أُمَّتِكَ
لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ وَحْدَهُ وَحْدَهُ

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ali Bin Al Numan, from the one who mentioned it,
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws having said: ‘Jibraeelas said to Rasool-Allahsaww: ‘Tooba (a tree in the Paradise), is for the ones from yoursaww community who say,
‘There is no god except Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, Alone, Alone, Alone’’.
en.sarwar: 1. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from Ali ibn al-Nu’Man from those whom he has mentioned (in his book) from abu ‘Abd Allah (a.s.) who has said the following: “Jibril once said to the Messenger of Allah, ‘ Tuba (a tree in paradise) is for those among your followers who (sincerely) say: ‘No one deserves to be worshipped except Allah, Allah alone, Allah alone, Allah alone.’”
